title: Optimal Facet Assembly of Multi-Transition Metals Layered Cathodes toward Superior Li-Ion Kinetics and Structural Stability
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00794H, Paper
Feng Zou, Jae-Bum Kim, Jiliang Zhang, Gi-Hyeok Lee, Lulu Lyu, Junhyeok Choi, Timo Kankaanpää, Yong Min Lee, Yong-Mook Kang
The surface stability of layered cathode materials is a critical determinant of their chemo-mechanical reversibility during intercalation/deintercalation. This is possibly because of the migration of transition metals (TMs) into the...
